[[File:CuffLinks promo 2.jpg|thumb|Minecraft Cufflinks tie.]]
'''CuffLinks''' is an online clothing brand that collaborated with [[Mojang Studios]] on a ''[[Minecraft]]''-themed collection, released in April 2025.
